Name: Lancer
Description:
Melee warrior. Former Adepts that chose a different way.

Abilities
- Slash
- Infusion mutation: Necromancer
- Infusion mutation: Crystalmancer

Upgrades
- Crystalline Infusion
- Advanced Genetics

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Move Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Move Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Crystalline cell-structure hardens the body as well as allow augmentation to enhance abilities.
Root.Name: Crystal Infusion

Root.Tooltip: Slashes a target for 40 damage and heals any nearby friendly unit for 20 health.
Root.Name: Healing Strike

Root.Tooltip: Slashes a target for 60 damage. 50% of the damage dealt is used for self healing
Root.Name: Slash

Root.Tooltip:
Infusion Effects:
- Greatly increases the damage dealt by **Slash**.
- 50% of damage dealt by Slash is used for self healing.
- Has +10 health.

Effect is permanent.
Root.Name: Necromancer

Root.Tooltip:
Infuse this unit to enhance its abilities.

Greatly increases the damage dealt by **Slash**. 50% of damage dealt by Slash is used for self healing. Has +10 health.
Infusion is permanent
Root.Name: Necromancer

Root.Tooltip: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip:
Infusion Effects:
- **Healing Strike**, 50% from damage dealt by Healing Strike can be used to regenerate health for any nearby friendly unit.
- **Crystalizing Shards**, allows to slow enemy movement.

Effect is permanent.
Root.Name: Crystalmancer

Root.Tooltip:
Infuse this unit to unlock new potential.

Converts the **Slash** ability into **Healing Strike**. 50% from damage dealt by Healing Strike can be used to regenerate health for any nearby friendly unit. This Lancer also gains **Crystalizing Shards** ability, allowing to slow enemy movement.
Infusion is permanent
Root.Name: Crystalmancer

Root.Tooltip: Reduces movement of units in the targeted area by 50% for 15 seconds. Reveals cloaked and burrowed units.
Root.Name: Crystalizing Shards

Root.Tooltip: Projects an invulnerable Shade that can move but cannot attack. After 10, the Adept teleports to the Shade's location.
Root.Name: Psionic Transfer

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel
